sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Process audit
sect1.para: This page shows information about the Audit trail for the instance of a BPEL process in case the Audit for the process is enabled.
Each event shows the current activity info separeted in an Id number, a Node name, an Additional info and a Date of the event.

simplelist.member: To view the process info page click the "Back" link or click the name of the process. This will go to a page showing the state of the process, possible actions for the process and a list of instances.
